rows.translation: By the Sky and the Night-Visitant (therein);-

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

rows.translation: And what will explain to thee what the Night-Visitant is?-
(It is) the Star of piercing brightness;-

rows.arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
rows.translation: There is no soul but has a protector over it.
Now let man but think from what he is created!
He is created from a drop emitted-
Proceeding from between the backbone and the ribs:
rows.transliteration: yakhruju min bayniṣ ṣulbi wat tarā-ib

rows.translation: Surely (Allah) is able to bring him back (to life)!
The Day that (all) things secret will be tested,

rows.arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
rows.translation: (Man) will have no power, and no helper.
rows.transliteration: famā lahu min quwwatin walā nāṣir

rows.translation: By the Firmament which returns (in its round),
And by the Earth which opens out (for the gushing of springs or the sprouting of vegetation),-
Behold this is the Word that distinguishes (Good from Evil):
It is not a thing for amusement.
As for them, they are but plotting a scheme,
And I am planning a scheme.
Therefore grant a delay to the Unbelievers: Give respite to them gently (for awhile).
